org.gradle.process.daemon

Interface WorkerDaemonExecutor


  • @Incubating
public interface WorkerDaemonExecutor
    Worker Daemon Executor.
    Since:
    3.3

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorkerDaemonExecutor classpath(Iterable<File> files)
      Adds a set of files to the classpath associated with the daemon process.
      void execute()
      Synchronously executes the work in a daemon process.
      WorkerDaemonExecutor forkOptions(Action<? super JavaForkOptions> forkOptionsAction)
      Executes the provided action against the JavaForkOptions object associated with this builder.
      JavaForkOptions getForkOptions()
      Returns the JavaForkOptions object associated with this builder.
      WorkerDaemonExecutor params(Serializable... params)
      Sets any initialization parameters to use when constructing an instance of the implementation class.

    • Method Detail

      • classpath

        WorkerDaemonExecutor classpath(Iterable<File> files)
        Adds a set of files to the classpath associated with the daemon process.
        Parameters:
        files - - the files to add to the classpath
        Returns:
        this builder

      • forkOptions

        WorkerDaemonExecutor forkOptions(Action<? super JavaForkOptions> forkOptionsAction)
        Executes the provided action against the JavaForkOptions object associated with this builder.
        Parameters:
        forkOptionsAction - - An action to configure the JavaForkOptions for this builder
        Returns:
        this builder

      • getForkOptions

        JavaForkOptions getForkOptions()
        Returns the JavaForkOptions object associated with this builder.
        Returns:
        the JavaForkOptions of this builder

      • params

        WorkerDaemonExecutor params(Serializable... params)
        Sets any initialization parameters to use when constructing an instance of the implementation class.
        Parameters:
        params - - the parameters to use during construction
        Returns:
        this builder

      • execute

        void execute()
             throws WorkerDaemonExecutionException
        Synchronously executes the work in a daemon process. Each call will execute in an idle daemon that meets the requirements set on this builder. If no idle daemons are available, a new daemon will be started.
        Throws:
        WorkerDaemonExecutionException - when a failure occurs while executing the work.
